pages.text: With an $(l:crafts/cores)Animation Core$(), you're able to bring a block of slime to life as a loyal Slime Servant. Using a Slimeball will heal them but a Block of Slime on them will not only heal, but also increase their size up to a point.

Slimes aren't the only thing you can animate into loyal servants. Using an animation core on a magma block will transform it into a loyal Magma Cube servant. Instead of a Block of Slime, Magma Cream is used to heal and Magma Blocks to increase their size.
Using an $(l:crafts/cores)Animation Core$() on a Block of Slime while within a Crypt will summon forth a loyal ectoplasmic Crypt Slime.
